revision.text:
{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Zap Plate |image = [[File:Zap_Plate_Updated.png|150px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Zap Plate''. |price = |location = [[Underground]] [[Berry Master]] }}
==Description== '''Zap Plates''' are 4x3 square big items you can mine up from the [[Underground]]. They can then be sold for 100 Electric [[Gems]][[File:Electric_Gem.png|15px]] or traded for other items in Daily Deals if available that day.
==Details== The Zap Plate is a [[Gem Plates|Gem Plate]] that can Either sold for 100 Electric [[Gems]][[File:Electric_Gem.png|15px]] or used on Daily Deals in the [[Underground]]
{{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Gems]]

{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Zap Plate |image = [[File:Zap_Plate_Updated.png|150px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Zap Plate''. |price = |location = [[Underground]] [[Berry Master]] }}
==Description== '''Zap Plates''' are 4x3 square big items you can mine up from the [[Underground]]. They can then be sold for 100 Electric [[Gems]][[File:Electric_Gem.png|15px]] or traded for other items in Daily Deals if available that day.
==Details== Its a Plate that can Either sold for 100 Electric [[Gems]][[File:Electric_Gem.png|15px]] or used on Daily Deals in the [[Underground]]
{{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Shards]]
